metadata.title: CVE-2024-36030 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:octeontx2-af: fix the double free in rvu_npc_freemem()Clang static checker(scan-build) warning?drivers/net/ethernet/marvell/octeontx2/af/rvu_npc.c:line 2184, column 2Attempt to free released memory.npc_mcam_rsrcs_deinit() has released 'mcam->counters.bmap'. Deleted thisredundant kfree() to fix this double free problem.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
